hero.desc: I am a Frontend Developer creating creative and user-friendly web applications. I place great importance on clean code and aesthetic interfaces. You can find more information in the 'About Me' section.

about.desc: I am Javid, an enthusiastic and creative frontend developer. I have experience with technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I focus on enhancing user experience by balancing the aesthetic and functional aspects of web applications. Alongside programming, continuously learning new technologies and improving my skills is a priority for me.
about.other: Other: UI Design and Component Creation, API Integration
